translations.translation: and of Ibrahim, who paid his dues in full:
And of Abraham who fulfilled his trust? --
and of Abraham, who lived up to the trust?
and about Abraham who fulfilled his duty (to God)?
And of Ibrahim, who was most obedient?
And of Ibrahim who fulfilled all that:
And (of) Ibrahim who fulfilled (the commandments):
and Abraham, he who paid his debt in full?
And Abraham who paid his debt:
And with Abraham who kept his word:
And of Ibrahim who faithfully fulfilled?
and of Abraham, who fulfilled [his summons]:
And of Abraham who fulfilled his engagements?-
And of Ibrahim (Abraham) who fulfilled (or conveyed) all that (what Allah ordered him to do or convey),
and Abraham, who paid his debt in full?
And of Abraham, who fulfilled?
And [of] Abraham, who fulfilled [his obligations] -

[53:37] and, the scrolls of, Abraham who fulfilled [his summons], [he who] completed what he had been charged with, as in: And when his Lord tested Abraham with certain words and he fulfilled them [Q. 2:124] (the explication of mā, ‘what’, is [the following]):
(And Abraham who paid his debt) i.e. he conveyed the message of his Lord and acted upon that which Allah had commanded him; it is also said that this means: he did as he was told in his dream vision:

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَإِبْرَاهِيمَ ٱلَّذِي وَفَّىٰ } معناه بَلَّغَ ما أُمِرَ بِهِ

translations.translation: And His saying, "And Abraham who fulfilled [the promise]," his meaning is that he conveyed what he was ordered to.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ وَ } لم ينبأ أيضاً بما في صحف { إِبْرَاهِيمَ } الذي يدعي متابعته والتدين بدينه
 مع أن إبراهيم { ٱلَّذِي وَفَّىٰ } [النجم: 37] ووفر وأتم بجميع ما التزمه وأمر به
 وبالغ في وفاء ما عاهد والتزم طلباً لمرضاة ربه
 وهو يدعي متابعته
 ولم يوفِ بما التزم من العهود


وكيف يحمل الغير عنه وزره أو يسقطه الصدقة
